participant_1.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.

participant_2.background: my favorite singer is taylor swift. i love eating out with friends. i'm getting married in the spring. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i'm 24 years old.
